Text.Name: Pessimism
Text.DisplayName: มองโลกในแง่ร้าย
Text.Desc: This person is very pessimistic, always assuming the worst.

Text.Name: Optimistic
Text.DisplayName: มองโลกในแง่ดี
Text.Desc: This person is very optimistic, always looking on the bright side.

Text.Name: Numbness
Text.Desc: The stresses of day-to-day living have left this person feeling numb. However, this means that [IT] is even tired of thinking at all, is used to this numbness, and will not slack in their work due to their low spirits.

Text.Name: Sensitive
Text.Desc: [IT] is very curious about the world beyond, and cannot bear to live out a dull life.

Text.Name: Enthusiasm
Text.Desc: [IT] is very friendly towards everyone.

Text.Name: Distrust
Text.DisplayName: แคลงใจในรัก
Text.Desc: [IT] does not believe in true love, or place their trust in anybody.

Text.Name: Strong
Text.Desc: [IT] is strong-willed and can endure greater suffering than others.

Text.Name: Weak
Text.Desc: [IT] has always been sheltered and cannot bear the slightest pain.

Text.Name: BadMentality
Text.DisplayName: อารมณ์ร้าย
Text.Desc: [IT] is always too irritated to get any work done.

Text.Name: GoodMentality
Text.Desc: [IT] has a good temper, and is not easily annoyed or saddened.

Text.Name: Rugged
Text.Desc: [IT] is careless in their work, always finishing fast and paying little attention to the details.

Text.Name: Careful
Text.Desc: [IT] is very meticulous in their work, always taking time to improve the details.

Text.Name: Lazy
Text.Desc: [IT] does not want to work.

Text.Name: Industrious
Text.Desc: [IT] is hardworking and efficient.

Text.Name: Feminization
Text.Desc: Despite being a man, [IT] has a somewhat feminine manner and personality.

Text.Name: Masculinity
Text.Desc: Despite being a woman, [IT] has a somewhat masculine manner and personality.

Text.Name: Affinity
Text.Desc: This person is very agreeable and charming.

Text.Name: Cruel
Text.Desc: This person is very harsh, often upsetting other people.

Text.Name: HeartKnot
Text.Desc: This person has a troubled soul, always depressed and sleep-deprived as a result of their nightmares.

Text.Name: Depressed
Text.DisplayName: ไม่มีความสุข
Text.Desc: This person has gone through a very bad breakup and is always unhappy.

Text.Name: Anatman
Text.Desc: This person has reached a mental state of liberation, free from worldly troubles.

Text.Name: FearFlame
Text.Desc: This person is extremely afraid of fire and cannot do any fire-related work.
